name: Dusknoir
author: danciao
flavor_text: It comes and goes between this world and the afterlife. People fear this Pokémon because it is said to suck in lost spirits and take them along.

abilities.name: Cursed Blast
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put 13 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. If you use this Ability, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Shadow Bind
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.
